attributes.description: As a family run business we pride ourselves to bring you excellent customer service and quality vehicles. All vehicles are sent for a thorough HMG Quality Approved workshop inspection. Come and visit our showroom in La Belle Road, Stikland, Cape Town. We can also arrange your finance application with all major financial institutions. Contact Wynand Dippenaar today for a test drive. ISUZU is our Passion !!! *Excludes On the Road Fee of R6250* *t&c's apply*
attributes.title: 2018 Ford EcoSport 1.5 TDCi Ambiente

attributes.description:
Welcome to Praise Motors,where we sell reliable cars at an affordable price. Used cars for sale in Kempton Park. Johannesburg.We Deal with All Kind Of Used Cars. Cash Deals and Finance Deals Available ,Trade Ins are welcome. Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees

Car Details::::: Toyota Urban Cruiser

Year Model:::2022

Model Body Shape::: Suv

Transmission Drive:::Manual

Engine Capacity:::1.5

No of Doors::: 5 Doors

Kilometers::: 1000

Service History:::Full Service History

We look forward to seeing you at our dealership. Great Prices. Great Vehicles. Great Service. Come See What We Have To Offer. Committed to better service. Creating a Higher Standard. Don’t dream it. Drive it! Drive your dreams

Very clean and well maintained. A well looked after vehicle, looks and smells nice and drives perfectly well.We assist you in obtaining the best finance deal in the market with pre-approved finance. 

EXTRAS:::Air Conditioning, ABS,Central Locking System,Clean Interior,Alarm,immaculate condition,Air Bags,Electric Windows,Power Steering,Good Tyres,CD Player.Bluetooth.
                 PRAISE MOTORS
LOCATION::: No  1 Catalina Avenue Rhodesfield Kempton Park. 

FEATURES==Air Conditioning System, ABS, Central Locking System ,Clean Interior, Alarm, Air Bags, Electric Windows, Well Serviced, Power Steering, Mags, mp3 Player. Anti-Lock Braking System, Smash and Grab, Aux, Road Stress Free, Excellent Interior, Excellent Sound System, Excellent Wheels and Tires, in excellent condition especially the engine. Exactly as seen on the picture. PRAISE MOTORS 1 Catalina Avenue, Rhodesfield. Kempton Park 1920 ,

attributes.description: The 350 BlueTEC Luxury Sedans is arguably the world's most advanced diesel, the BlueTEC is also the cleanest. Along with certified ultralow emissions, it can deliver 100 km/h in 6.7 seconds. Some feutures include: Keyless Go, Power Steering, Multi function steering, Auto cruise, Dual Airbags, Airconditioning, Sunroof, Electric windows, Electric seats,Heated Seats, Leather, Electric mirrors, Alarm, Central locking, mags, IPOS/AUX/USB, Prof Navigation, Blue tooth, Run flat Tyres and ABS as well as a tow hook.

attributes.description:
OUR GUARANTEE ON ALL FINANCED VEHICLES SOLD:

1.	101 Multi point check by AA/DEKRA

3.	Battery check by regional battery fitment centre

5.	1 YEAR WARRANTY AVAILABLE Finance is available.
